title: Rihanna goes wild in flashy leopard print dress for launch of visual autobiography
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Red hot Rihanna takes a walk on the wild side as she flashes her tatts in a leopard print dress.

The 31-year-old singer and entrepreneur was at the Guggenheim Museum in New York on Friday night for the launch of her visual autobiography ' Rihanna '.

This comes as the star made history again as Vogue's November 2019 issue features her for the sixth time.

And Forbes names her the wealthiest female musician in the world.

(Image: WireImage,)

(Image: Getty Images for Rihanna)

The stunning Barbadian babe wore a chic nude dress for the front cover - her own design from Fenty, teamed with natural makeup to enhance her sultry green eyes and glowy skin.

In her issue, she chats about fashion, including fashion houses which give her designer envy, and gushes over her Fenty business.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

She has the most solo American Vogue covers of any black woman in history, and this is her sixth cover for the publication.

Before she modelled for this month's magazine cover, she was on front of the issue for April 2011, November 2012, March 2014, April 2016, and June 2018.

And previously, Rihanna and Shari Belafonte were tied for the same amount of solo American Vogue covers with five, and model Naomi Campbell has bagged two solo American Vogue covers, and Lupita Nyong'o and Beyonce both have four.
description: This comes as Barbadian beauty made history as Vogue's November 2019 issue features her for the sixth time
